item.description: Lighthouse Inn will take you to a time gone by…secluded and relaxing, with refreshing ocean breezes to rejuvenate your spirit…this is Classic Cape Cod. Situated on nine secluded oceanfront acres, the Lighthouse Inn offers a private sandy beach with panoramic ocean views. We will have lunch on the waterfront with light fare such as Caesar chicken salad, fried clams, chowder or cheeseburgers. Specialty frozen drinks are available. This is a truly relaxing Cape Cod setting for lunch!
item.how_to_find_us: Barbara will meet you inside wearing the Girls Just Wanna Have Fun pin!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch at Lighthouse Inn
